Mr. John W. Gardner, President
Carnegie Foundation for the Advancement
of Teaching
589 Fifth Avenue
Mew Tork 17, New York
Dear Mr. Gardners
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming
KAEB Network offering. I thought you might be interested in what
the nation* s educational radio network is doing. I also thought
you might have particular interest in the programs listed on
pa@ss 9, 10, 13, lit, 19, 20, 23, 39, ltl, lit, It5, 32, aid S3.
Sincerely,
HJSsJO
Harry J. Skoraia
Executive Director
